title: 8 Essential Tips for Designers Crafting Branded Templates in Figma Buzz

paragraphs.content: Figma's official blog outlines eight key tips for designers building branded templates in Figma Buzz, focusing on responsive designs that maintain brand consistency while enabling marketing teams to customize assets easily.These tips emphasize tools like auto layout for flexible spacing in buttons and text boxes, preventing misalignment from varying content lengths.Brand controls in Buzz lock critical elements such as logos, allowing edits only to designated fields like body text or images.

sections.title: Leveraging Auto Layout and Layer Strategies for Responsive Templates

paragraphs.content: Auto layout serves as the backbone of responsive template design, ensuring elements maintain consistent spacing and adjust to content changes like long headlines.Designers should structure text layers modularly, separating styles and inputs to preserve formatting across campaigns generated via Bulk Create.Testing templates with realistic content verifies behavior under varied inputs, catching issues like text overlap early.
